title: Slayer task/Black dragons

properties.name: description
properties.value:
Black dragons can be assigned as a slayer task at level 80 combat by various Slayer masters after partial completion of Dragon Slayer I. Note: The brutal black dragon variant requires level 77 Slayer to kill.
Black dragons are found in small numbers in various caves all over the world. They attack with melee and dragonfire, thus some protection against it should be considered (the brutal black dragon also uses magic). Due to their large size, they are usually able to be safespotted with ranged or halberd-like weapons. As dragons they are also weak to dragonbane weapons.

content:
Black dragons
Requirements
SkillsNone
Combat level 80
OtherPartial completion of Dragon Slayer I
Task Amounts
Krystilia5-20
Konar10-15 (40-60)
Nieve10-20 (40-60)
Duradel10-20 (40-60)
Advanced data
Icon IDNo

Black dragons can be assigned as a slayer task at level 80 combat by various Slayer masters after partial completion of Dragon Slayer I. Note: The brutal black dragon variant requires level 77 Slayer to kill. Black dragons are found in small numbers in various caves all over the world. They attack with melee and dragonfire, thus some protection against it should be considered (the brutal black dragon also uses magic). Due to their large size, they are usually able to be safespotted with ranged or halberd-like weapons. As dragons they are also weak to dragonbane weapons.

Slayer Unlocks[edit | edit source]

Main article: Slayer reward point
Unlock Points cost Notes
Fire & Darkness 50 Number of black dragons assigned is increased to 40-60.

Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat level Slayer XP Locations Notes
Baby black dragon 83 80
  • Taverley Dungeon
  • Evil Chicken's Lair
  • Corsair Cove Cave
  • Weakest variant of black dragons. Drops only baby dragon bones, but does not use dragonfire.
  • The Taverley Dungeon area is task-only.
  • The Evil Chicken's Lair requires partial completion of Recipe for Disaster/Freeing Sir Amik Varze as well as a raw chicken and a rope.
  • The Corsair Cove Cave requires completion of Dragon Slayer II.
Black dragon 227 199.5
  • Taverley Dungeon
  • Evil Chicken's Lair
  • Lava Maze Dungeon
  • Corsair Cove Dungeon
  • Mynydd
  • The standard version of black dragon.
  • The Evil Chicken's Lair requires partial completion of Recipe for Disaster/Freeing Sir Amik Varze as well as a raw chicken and a rope.
  • The Corsair Cove Cave requires completion of Dragon Slayer II.
  • Mynydd requires completion of Song of the Elves.
Black dragon 247 262
  • Wilderness Slayer Cave
  • A slightly higher-level variant. Only found in the Wilderness Slayer Cave.
King Black Dragon 276 258
  • King Black Dragon Lair
  • A boss monster found in his lair accessed through a lever in the Wilderness. Although the arena itself is NOT considered in the Wilderness.
  • For more information on fighting the King Black Dragon, see King Black Dragon/Strategies.
Brutal black dragon 318 346.5
  • Catacombs of Kourend
  • A particularly strong variant of black dragon with an additional magic attack. Requires level 77 Slayer.

Location Comparison[edit | edit source]

 This article is currently in the middle of an expansion or major revamping.
The information contained within it should not be considered fully accurate and/or complete. You can help by contributing to it.
Location Maplink Amount Multicombat Cannonable Safespotable Notes
Taverley Dungeon 2 No Yes Yes
Taverley Dungeon (upper level) 12 Adult dragons, 5 Baby dragons No Yes Yes
  • Black dragons can only be killed here while on a Slayer task.
Mynydd 1 No Yes Yes
  • Requires completion of Song of the Elves.
Lava Maze Dungeon 2 No Yes Yes
  • In the Wilderness.
Evil Chicken's Lair 4 Adult dragons, 1 Baby dragon No Yes Yes
  • Requires partial completion of Recipe for Disaster/Freeing Sir Amik Varze as well as a raw chicken to access (and a rope to access the baby black dragons).
Wilderness Slayer Cave 3 Yes Yes Yes
  • Only places where the level 247 variant is found. In the Wilderness.
Corsair Cove Dungeon 2 Adult dragons, 1 Baby dragon No Yes Yes
  • Requires completion of Dragon Slayer II.
King Black Dragon Lair 1 King Black Dragon Yes Yes No
  • Can only be accessed through a lever in the Wilderness. The arena itself is NOT considered part of the Wilderness.
  • For more information on fighting the King Black Dragon, see King Black Dragon/Strategies.
Catacombs of Kourend 4 Brutal dragons No No No
  • Brutal black dragons. Requires level 77 Slayer.

Black dragons can be assigned as a [[slayer task]] at level 80 [[combat]] by various [[Slayer master]]s after partial completion of [[Dragon Slayer I]]. '''Note:''' The [[brutal black dragon]] variant requires level 77 Slayer to kill.
Black dragons are found in small numbers in various caves all over the world. They attack with [[melee]] and [[dragonfire]], thus some protection against it should be considered (the [[brutal black dragon]] also uses [[magic]]). Due to their large size, they are usually able to be [[safespot]]ted with [[ranged]] or [[halberd]]-like weapons. As dragons they are also weak to [[dragonbane]] weapons.
